sen.e: He acted on the stage with a patch over one blind eye because of eye trouble, and died without seeing any improvement in the disease condition.
He was acting on the stage with a patch over one blind eye because of eye disease, and died without seeing any improvement in the condition.

sen.e: He was acting on the stage with a patch over one blind eye because of eye disease, and died without seeing any improvement in the condition.

sen.j: 九代目の落胆ぶりは並大抵ではなかった。
sen.e: The Ninth was extremely discouraged.
The Ninth was extremely disappointed.
The Ninth was extremely disappointed.

sen.j: それでもあえて長女の市川翠扇には恋愛結婚を許した。
sen.e: Even so he was ready to allow Suisen ICHIKAWA, his first daughter to have a love marriage.
Even so he allowed Suisen ICHIKAWA, his first daughter to have a love marriage.
sen.cmt: was ready to allow→allowed と修正しました。分割されていた訳文をまとめました。
sen.e: Even so he allowed Suisen ICHIKAWA, his first daughter to have a love marriage.

sen.j: 日本橋の商家に生れ、慶應義塾に学び、日本通商銀行に就職した、稲延福三郎というサラリーマンである。
sen.e: Her would-be partner was Fukusaburo INANOBU, an office worker, who was born in a merchant family, learned at Keio University, and worked for Japan Commerce Bank.
Her was Fukusaburo INANOBU, an office worker, who was born in a merchant family in Nihonbashi, learned at Keio University, and worked for Japan Commerce Bank.

sen.j: しかもこれを婿養子に取るとまでいう。
sen.e: In addition, Danjuro said that he would adopt him.
In addition, Danjuro said that he would adopt him.
In addition, Danjuro said that he would adopt him.

sen.j: 福三郎は一介の銀行員だったが、その父はやがて東京市会議員になるほどの地元の名士で、福三郎の陽性な性格の中にもそうした育ちの良さが感じられた。
sen.e: Fukusaburo was a mere bank clerk, but having a father who was a local prominent figure who became a member of the Tokyo City Assembly before long, Fukusaburo had something gentle in his cheerful character.

Fukusaburo was a mere bank clerk, but having a father who was a local prominent figure who became a member of the Tokyo City Assembly before long; Fukusaburo had something gentle in his cheerful character.

sen.e: Fukusaburo was a mere bank clerk, but having a father who was a local prominent figure who became a member of the Tokyo City Assembly before long; Fukusaburo had something gentle in his cheerful character.

sen.j: しかもなかなかの勉強家で、書画骨董の素養もあり、話題に豊富な文化人だった。
sen.e: Moreover, he was quite a studious man, well grounded in calligraphic works and paintings, and in antiques, and a man of culture having a rich stock of topics for conversation.
Moreover, he was quite a studious man, well grounded in calligraphic works and paintings, and in antiques, and a man of culture having a rich stock of topics for conversation.

sen.j: そしてなによりも、長女の良き伴侶として文句の付けようがない夫だった。
sen.e: And more than anything else, he was a perfect husband as a good partner to his first daughter.
And more than anything else, he was a perfect husband as a good partner to his first daughter.
And more than anything else, he was a perfect husband as a good partner to his first daughter.

sen.j: 稲延福三郎が堀越福三郎として市川宗家に婿養子に入った2年後、團十郎はついに後継者の件についてはなんら手を打つことなく、静かにこの世を去った。
sen.e: Two years after Fukusaburo INANOBU became a member of the ICHIKAWA Soke as Fukusaburo HORIKOSHI, Danjuro passed away quietly before solving a matter of successors at all.
Two years later Fukusaburo INANOBU became a member of the head family of Ichikawa as Fukusaburo HORIKOSHI, Danjuro passed away quietly before solving the matter of successors at all.
